casebody.data:
Patricia T. ESCH, Personal Representative of the Estate of Stephen Stiles, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Nasim YACOB, MD, Jim McFadden, RN, Minerva Booker, RN, Esther West, RN, Claire Everson, LPN, Doris Lemmen, LPN, and Corizon Health, Inc., Defendants-Appellants,
and
David Sova, DO, and West Michigan Urgent Care, Inc., Defendants-Appellees. SC: 156181
COA: 332933 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 3, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the June 13, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.

I, Larry S. Royster, Clerk of the Michigan Supreme Court, certify that the foregoing is a true and complete copy of the order entered at the direction of the Court.
